info.title: SimpleModDownloader
info.author: PoloNX
info.details: An easy tool to download mods for your switch!\nEver wish you didn't have to keep switching back and forth from your switch to your computer to download and install mods? Now you can download mods from your switch with this tool!\n(SimpleModManager needs to be installed to install mods)
